Additional Info
Features: NOTICE: Please make sure your motherboard is equipped with on-board USB 3.0 sockets before purchasing.

ATX Full Tower Gaming Computer Case with Side Panel Window

Micro ATX / ATX / Mini ITX / E-ATX Motherboard Compatibility 

Supports up to 180mm High CPU Cooler

Supports up to 280mm Long Liquid-cooling Radiator on Top

Tool-less Design Installation for 5.25" and 3.5" Devices

Total 8 HDD Trays Support Both 3.5" and 2.5"

Easy-Access Dust Filter

Designed with Top Fins to Allow Maximum Air Flow
